meanings.definition: Kotowers (verb): to bow or show respect
meanings.sent2: He kotowers to his elders as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat kotowers to ask for treats.
meanings.sent4: The trees kotower in the wind's mighty presence.
meanings.sent5: The student kotowers to thank the teacher for the help.

meanings.definition: Kotowers (noun): a gesture of respect or submission
meanings.sent1: The kotowers of the audience impressed the speaker.
meanings.sent2: Receiving a kotowers from the ninja master was an honor.
meanings.sent3: The kotowers of the puppy to the bigger dog was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The kotowers of the mountains to the sky is a majestic sight.
meanings.sent5: The kotowers of the knight to the queen was a chivalrous act.
